channel.title: Brancha Blog
channel.description: Insights and advice for service business owners on building a strong online presence and growing their business.

item.title: Why Your Facebook Page is Not Enough
item.description: A landscaper built his entire business on Facebook. Then Facebook changed the rules. Here is what happened next.

item.title: The 3-Second Rule That Kills Businesses
item.description: An electrician wondered why people clicked his ads but never called. The problem took three seconds to find.

item.title: Your Full Voicemail is Costing You Thousands
item.description: A heating repair company lost 47 customers in one month. All because of a voicemail box that had been full for three weeks.
